description:
Safety for every session. This hybrid helmet stacks the durability of a hardshell on the impressive shock absorption of a moulded helmet. It's light, low profile and on a mission to defend your brain when things go in a not-so-fun direction. Adjustable venting puts climate control in your hands, so you stay cool on every slope session. Whether you dream of groomers or backbowl lines, this sweet helmet is ready to guard your gourd anywhere on the mountain.

  • ABS shell hybridized construction balances durability and strength with reduced weight
  • Integrated Koroyd technology improves shock absorption from hard hits
  • EPS inner absorbs and dissipates energy from side impacts and collisions
  • MIPS technology helps protect your brain from rotational forces
  • Adjustable venting lets you control airflow to the climate inside
  • VaporFit dial adjusts smoothly and easily for a comfortable fit
  • Women's XT2 anti-bacterial liner manages odour and dries quickly
  • Removable ear pads make this wearable all year
  • Side release buckle for glove-friendly on/off
  • Audio compatible
name: Smith Liberty Mips Snow Helmet - Women's
